c: b'(\theta) \propto b(\theta) P((s, a, r, s') | \theta) = b(\theta) \mathcal{P}_\theta(s' | s, a) \mathcal{R}_\theta(r | s, a)

\label{bamdp-mdp}
    \mathcal{P}^+((s', b'') | (s, b), a) = \mathds{1}(b''=b')\int_{\theta} \mathcal{P}_\theta(s' | s, a) b(\theta) d\theta,\ \mathcal{R}^+((s, b), a) = \int_{\theta} \mathcal{R}_\theta(s, a) b(\theta) d\theta
Q^*(x, a) = \mathcal{R}^+(x, a) + \gamma \int_{x'} V^*(x') \mathcal{P}^+(x'|x, a) d x',\ V^*(x') = \max_a Q^*(x', a)

\mathcal{L}(\mathcal{P}_{\theta}^i) = -\mathbb{E}_{(s, a, s') \sim \mathcal{D}_\mu} \left[\log \mathcal{P}_{\theta}^i(s'|s, a)\right],\ \mathcal{L}(\mathcal{R}_{\theta}^i) = -\mathbb{E}_{(s, a, r) \sim \mathcal{D}_\mu} \left[\log \mathcal{R}_{\theta}^i(r|s, a)\right]

\label{b'}
    b'(\theta)(i) = x^i / \sum_{j=1}^K x^j,\ x^i = b(\theta)(i)\mathcal{P}_\theta^i(s' | s, a) \mathcal{R}_\theta^i(r | s, a)

\label{p-rwd}
    \Tilde{r}(s, a, r, b(\theta)) = r - \lambda \sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^K b(\theta)(i) (\sigma_{\theta}^i(s, a)^2 + \mu_{\theta}^i(s, a)^2) - \mu_\theta(s, a)^2}
v_{\text{ret}} = \sum_{a \in C((s, h))} \frac{N((s, h), a)}{N((s, h))} Q((s, h), a)
r, s', b'(\theta) \leftarrow \textproc{StatePW}((s, h), b(\theta), a)
Q((s, h), a) \mathrel{{+}{=}} \frac{R - Q((s, h), a)}{N((s, h), a)}
N((s, h), a), Q((s, h), a) \leftarrow 0, 0
\pi_{\text{ret}}(a|(s, h)) \propto N((s, h), a), a \in C((s, h))
s, h, b(\theta) \leftarrow s', hars', b'(\theta)
N((s, h), a), Q((s, h), a) \leftarrow 0, 0
Q((s, h), a) \mathrel{{+}{=}} \frac{R - Q((s, h), a)}{N((s, h), a)}
a \leftarrow \arg \max_{x} Q((s, h), x) + c \sqrt{\frac{\log N((s, h))}{N((s, h), x)}}

Z = 1/\int_\theta \mathcal{P}_\theta(s'|s, a) b(\theta|h) d\theta = 1/\int_\theta \mathcal{P}_\theta(s'|s, a) \tilde{b}(\theta|h) d\theta = 1/\int_\theta \mathcal{P}_\theta(s'|s, a) \tilde{b}(\theta|ha) d\theta
\tilde{Q}((s, h), x) = Q((s, h), x) + c \sqrt{\frac{\log N((s, h))}{N((s, h), x)}}
\tilde{Q}((s, h), x) = Q((s, h), x) + \sqrt{\frac{N((s, h))^{e(d)}}{N((s, h), x)}}
\tilde{Q}((s, h), x) = Q((s, h), x) + \hat{\pi}(x|(s, h)) \frac{\sqrt{N((s, h))}}{1+N((s, h), x)} \left(c_1 + \log \left(\frac{N((s,h))+c_2+1}{c_2}\right)\right)
\bar{Q}((s, h), x) = \frac{Q((s, h), x) - Q_{\text{min}}}{Q_{\text{max}} - Q_{\text{min}}}
\pi_{\text{ret}}((s, h)) = \arg \max_{a \in C((s, h))} Q((s, h), a)
\pi_{\text{ret}}(a|(s, h)) = \frac{N((s, h), a)^{1/\tau}}{\sum_{x \in C((s, h))}N((s, h), x)^{1/\tau}}
\pi_{\text{ret}}(a|(s, h)) \propto \pi(a|(s, h)) \exp(Q((s, h), a) - V((s, h)))
